p.e:
DAY PHASE: Durin the day phase all players will
be able to do as many actions as their energy
will allow them to do.

NIGHT PHASE: During the night phase a random "night"
event card will be drawn- this card can be good
but will more likely be an obstacle to overcome,
players can do actions with remaining energy or they
can choose to sleep. any action during night will result
in the player rolling the "mistake" dice.

MORNING PHASE: During this phase the players will
regain all energy [if they did not sleep during the
night phase they only regain half energy] all 
recorces that are depleted are taken out during
this phase
